thread.title: Emmerdale spoilers: Police officers storm Aaron and Robert's wedding ceremony
thread.title_full: Emmerdale spoilers: Police officers storm Aaron and Robert's wedding ceremony

author: Neil Batey
title: Emmerdale spoilers: Police officers storm Aaron and Robert's wedding ceremony
text:
'Robron' look set to wed - until the Rozzers gate crash the ceremony! (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Star-crossed Emmerdale lovers Aaron and Robert are finally set to get hitched. Not that Aaron has a clue what’s going on – Robert wants to stun the moody mechanic with a surprise ceremony at The Woolpack. 
Predictably, making sure Aaron is in the right place at the right time proves a nightmare. Paddy is still determined to sabotage the nuptials, so Cain has to resort to heavy-handed tactics to get the unsuspecting groom to the pub. 
When Aaron finally arrives, his gast is truly flabbered as he realises what Robert has planned. Harriet leads the service as Robert and Aaron prepare to wed (Photo: ITV) 
The villagers have decorated their local and Aaron is actually spotted smiling – a rare sight indeed! Robron, as fans have nicknamed the couple, prepare to tie the knot, but then the police storm the pub mid-ceremony. The Yorkshire Dales coppers ruin Robron's wedding ceremony in the Woolpack (Photo: ITV) 
Are they about to arrest one of the grooms? Or both, even? 
And don’t forget that Aaron is still awaiting his court sentencing for assaulting Kasim. He could yet spend his honeymoon in jail. Read More Debbie takes a flyer Debbie ponders using her fake passport at the airport, with poorly Sarah (Photo: ITV) 
As Sarah Sugden prepares to fly to Prague for cancer treatment in the ITV soap, her caring mum risks being arrested to support the brave young lass. 
The Dingles try to convince Debbie that travelling abroad with her daughter would be too risky because of her criminal record. But she refuses to listen and asks bad boy Ross to get her a fake passport. 
Debbie packs for the Czech Republic and heads to the airport, where she narrowly avoids being caught. 
At the last minute, she starts to wonder how convincing her forged ID will be. Has she seen sense? Home cheat home Laurel and daughter Gabby worry about Ashley, who's in a care home (Photo: ITV) 
Dementia sufferer Ashley may be getting professional help in a care home, but the heartache continues for his wife, Laurel. 
She goes to visit the confused curate at the residential facility, and decides to take him out for a picnic. 
But she’s saddened when poor old Ashley soon forgets who she is. As his memory deteriorates rapidly, Laurel realises their relationship may never be the same again. But there’s even worse news when Laurel learns that Ashley has made a new, er, ‘friend’ already...
